pkgmetadata.longdescription: libtfr provides high-performance C and Python libraries forcalculating multitaper time-frequency reassignment (TFR) spectrogramsas well as conventional STFTs. TFR spectrograms have enhancedsignal-to-noise characteristics and can provide very precise spectralestimates under many conditions. The library requires FFTW for the underlyingFFT transformations.
